00043 #include <cfg/memory.h>
00044 #include <sys/types.h>
00045 
00055 typedef struct _HEAPNODE HEAPNODE;
00056 
00061 struct _HEAPNODE {
00062     size_t hn_size;     
00063 #ifdef NUTDEBUG_HEAP
00064     HEAPNODE *ht_next;
00065     size_t ht_size;
00066     CONST char *ht_file;
00067     int ht_line;
00068 #endif
00069     HEAPNODE *hn_next;  
00070 };
00071 
00072 
00073 extern HEAPNODE *heapFreeList;
00074 
00075 #define NutHeapAdd(a, s)                NutHeapRootAdd(&heapFreeList, a, s)
00076 #define NutHeapAvailable()              NutHeapRootAvailable(&heapFreeList)
00077 #define NutHeapRegionAvailable()        NutHeapRootRegionAvailable(&heapFreeList)
00078 
00079 #ifdef NUTDEBUG_HEAP
00080 #define NutHeapAlloc(s)                 NutHeapDebugRootAlloc(&heapFreeList, s, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00081 #define NutHeapAllocClear(s)            NutHeapDebugRootAllocClear(&heapFreeList, s, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00082 #define NutHeapFree(p)                  NutHeapDebugRootFree(&heapFreeList, p, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00083 #define NutHeapRealloc(p, s)            NutHeapDebugRootRealloc(&heapFreeList, p, s, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00084 #else
00085 #define NutHeapAlloc(s)                 NutHeapRootAlloc(&heapFreeList, s)
00086 #define NutHeapAllocClear(s)            NutHeapRootAllocClear(&heapFreeList, s)
00087 #define NutHeapFree(p)                  NutHeapRootFree(&heapFreeList, p)
00088 #define NutHeapRealloc(p, s)            NutHeapRootRealloc(&heapFreeList, p, s)
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 #ifdef NUTMEM_SPLIT_FAST
00092 
00093 HEAPNODE *heapFastMemFreeList;
00094 
00095 #define NutHeapFastMemAdd(a, s)         NutHeapRootAdd(&heapFastMemFreeList, a, s)
00096 #define NutHeapFastMemAvailable()       NutHeapRootAvailable(&heapFastMemFreeList)
00097 #define NutHeapFastMemRegionAvailable() NutHeapRootRegionAvailable(&heapFastMemFreeList)
00098 
00099 #ifdef NUTDEBUG_HEAP
00100 #define NutHeapFastMemAlloc(s)          NutHeapDebugRootAlloc(&heapFastMemFreeList, s, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00101 #define NutHeapFastMemAllocClear(s)     NutHeapDebugRootAllocClear(&heapFastMemFreeList, s, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00102 #define NutHeapFastMemFree(p)           NutHeapDebugRootFree(&heapFastMemFreeList, p, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00103 #define NutHeapFastMemRealloc(p, s)     NutHeapDebugRootRealloc(&heapFastMemFreeList, p, s, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00104 #else
00105 #define NutHeapFastMemAlloc(s)          NutHeapRootAlloc(&heapFastMemFreeList, s)
00106 #define NutHeapFastMemAllocClear(s)     NutHeapRootAllocClear(&heapFastMemFreeList, s)
00107 #define NutHeapFastMemFree(p)           NutHeapRootFree(&heapFastMemFreeList, p)
00108 #define NutHeapFastMemRealloc(p, s)     NutHeapRootRealloc(&heapFastMemFreeList, p, s)
00109 #endif
00110 
00111 #endif /* NUTMEM_SPLIT_FAST */
00112 
00113 #if defined(NUTMEM_STACKHEAP) && defined(NUTMEM_SPLIT_FAST)
00114 /* Dedicated stack memory. */
00115 #define NutStackAlloc(s)                NutHeapFastMemAlloc(s)
00116 #define NutStackFree(p)                 NutHeapFastMemFree(p)
00117 #else
00118 /* Thread stacks resides in normal heap. */
00119 #define NutStackAlloc(s)                NutHeapAlloc(s)
00120 #define NutStackFree(p)                 NutHeapFree(p)
00121 #endif

00124 /* Prototypes */
00125 
00126 extern void NutHeapRootAdd(HEAPNODE** root, void *addr, size_t size);
00127 extern size_t NutHeapRootAvailable(HEAPNODE** root);
00128 extern size_t NutHeapRootRegionAvailable(HEAPNODE** root);
00129 
00130 #ifdef NUTDEBUG_HEAP
00131 extern void *NutHeapDebugRootAlloc(HEAPNODE** root, size_t size, CONST char *file, int line);
00132 extern void *NutHeapDebugRootAllocClear(HEAPNODE** root, size_t size, CONST char *file, int line);
00133 extern int NutHeapDebugRootFree(HEAPNODE** root, void *block, CONST char *file, int line);
00134 extern void *NutHeapDebugRootRealloc(HEAPNODE** root, void * block, size_t size, CONST char *file, int line);
00135 #else
00136 extern void *NutHeapRootAlloc(HEAPNODE** root, size_t size);
00137 extern void *NutHeapRootAllocClear(HEAPNODE** root, size_t size);
00138 extern int NutHeapRootFree(HEAPNODE** root, void *block);
00139 extern void *NutHeapRootRealloc(HEAPNODE** root, void * block, size_t size);
00140 #endif
00141 
00142 extern int NutHeapCheck(void);
00143 extern void NutHeapDump(void * stream);
